feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: WSW 39 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
